short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a big green button near the top of a Github repo.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will add a big green "Latest Release" button near the top of a Github repo if that repo has a latest release. This button takes you to the latest releases page.
